detaileddescription.para: Scrollpolicies for the horizontal and vertical scrollbar. The policies are:

SHOW_ALWAYS - Always show the scrollbars no matter what. SHOW_NEVER - Never show the scrollbars no matter waht. SHOW_AUTO - Show the scrollbars only when needed. That is if the content grows larger then the ScrollArea.
Constructor.
Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: the content of the ScrollArea.

memberdef.argsstring: (Widget *content, unsigned int hPolicy, unsigned int vPolicy)
memberdef.name: ScrollArea

detaileddescription.para: Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: the content of the ScrollArea.
the policy for the horizontal scrollbar. See enum with policies.
the policy for the vertical scrollbar. See enum with policies.

Sets the content.

parameterdescription.para: the content of the ScrollArea.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the content.
Sets the horizontal scrollbar policy. See enum with policies.

parameterdescription.para: the policy for the horizontal scrollbar. See enum with policies.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the horizontal scrollbar policy. See enum with policies.

simplesect.para: the policy for the horizontal scrollbar policy. See enum with policies.

parameterdescription.para: the policy for the vertical scrollbar. See enum with policies.

simplesect.para: the policy for the vertical scrollbar. See enum with policies.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the horizontal and vertical scrollbar policy. See enum with policies.

parameterdescription.para: the policy for the horizontal scrollbar. See enum with policies.
the policy for the vertical scrollbar. See enum with policies.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the amount to scroll verticaly.

parameterdescription.para: the amount to scroll.

detaileddescription.para:
Gets the amount that is scrolled verticaly.
the scroll amount on vertical scroll.
Sets the amount to scroll horizontaly.

parameterdescription.para: the amount to scroll.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the amount that is scrolled horizontaly.

simplesect.para: the scroll amount on horizontal scroll.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the amount to scroll horizontaly and verticaly.

parameterdescription.para: the amount to scroll on horizontal scroll.
the amount to scroll on vertical scroll.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the maximum amount of horizontal scroll.
Gets the maximum amount of vertical scroll.
Sets the width.

parameterdescription.para: the width of the ScrollBar.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the width.
Tries to scroll to a specific rectangle. If the rectangle is to large to be visible as much as possibly, begining in the rectangles upper corner, will be visible.

parameterdescription.para: the Rectangle to scroll to.

detaileddescription.para: Draws the Widget. It is called by the parent widget when it is time for the Widget to draw itself. The graphics object is set up so that all drawing is relative to the Widget, i.e coordinate (0,0) is the top-left corner of the Widget. It is not possible to draw outside of a Widgets dimension.

parameterdescription.para: a Graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Draws a the Widget border. A border is drawn around a Widget. The width and height of the border is therefore the Widgets height+2*bordersize. Think of a painting that has a certain size, the border surrounds the painting.

parameterdescription.para: a Graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Called for all Widgets in the gui each time Gui::logic is called. You can do logic stuff here like playing an animation.
Called when a Widget recieves a MouseInput.
WARNING: This function is used internally to handle all mouse messages. Don't call or overload it unless you know what you are doing.

parameterdescription.para: the MouseInput message.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the mouse leaves the Widget area.
WARNING: This function is used internally be to handle mouse out messages. Don't call or overload this function unless you know what you are doing.
Sets the FocusHandler to be used.
WARNING: This function is used internally and should not be called or overloaded unless you know what you are doing.

parameterdescription.para: the FocusHandler to use.

detaileddescription.para: Called when a child of the BasicContainer gets destroyed.

parameterdescription.para: the destroyed Widget.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the drawing space size a Widget has in the BasicContainer. It may not be the same size as the Widgets width and height.
NOTE: Size is not checked recursively all the way back to the top Widget. If the BasicContainer itself is clipped, the size may be inaccurate.

parameterdescription.para: the width the Widget's draw space has.
the height the Widget's draw space has.
the Widget calling the function.

detaileddescription.para: Moves a widget to the bottom of the BasicContainer. The Widget will be drawn below all other Widgets in the BasicContainer.

parameterdescription.para: the Widget to move.

detaileddescription.para: Moves a Widget to the top of the BasicContainer. The widget will be drawn above all other Widgets in the BasicContainer.

parameterdescription.para: the Widget to move.

detaileddescription.para: Called when a mouse button is pressed when the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.
NOTE: A mouse press is NOT equal to a mouse click. Use mouseClickMessage to check for mouse clicks.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the button pressed.

detaileddescription.para: Called when a mouse button is released when the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the button released.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the mouse moves and the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.

detaileddescription.para: Called on a mouse wheel up when the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.

detaileddescription.para: Called on a mouse wheel down when the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.

detaileddescription.para: A ScrollArea in which another Widget can be added. It the other Widget is bigger then the ScrollArea, the ScrollArea will only display the part of the Widget that fits the ScrollArea and make it possible to scroll to the other areas of the Widget.
NOTE: A TextBox or a ListBox looks really ugly unless they exist in a ScrollArea.
